subject: Re: Re: Broken Loadcell (?)
description_text:
This Plate is bending, i think you can also see that on the picture. Then
at my normal brake pressure, because the metal plate is bend, the loadcell
touches the piece i´ve highlighted in the second picture. also i have a lot
of friction on the brake sometimes and it feels very uneven when im
pressing/releasing the brake. im very sure that its the little plastic
piece which the metal rot goes into or even the metal rod itself which
might cause some problems. maybe you can atleast also send me a new plastic
part since this shouldnt be a very expensive part anyway. order number, my
adress, etc.i already send you in my last mails.

conversations.body_text: Hi Nils Dautzenberg,  Hello, could you please provide a clear side-view photo of the metal part? Also, kindly share your order number. I need to confirm the thickness so I can arrange a replacement part for you tomorrow.
Hi Nils Dautzenberg,  We’re awaiting your response. Thank you for your support!

Hey, this is the bend plate which now even broke after i kept using it.
also here are photos of th plastic part where the metal rod goes into which
i would  appreciate if i got it new as i get a lot of resistance when
pressing or releasing the brake. the metal plate is ~3mm thick, a new one
might do the job as the other parts are intact, however, im not sure if it
wont bend again so it might be better to get a thicker version, but that
would mean that u need to send additional parts of course, so that
everything fits.

Am Mi., 11. Juni 2025 um 04:40 Uhr schrieb service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com>:

> Hi Nils Dautzenberg,
>
> We’re awaiting your response. Thank you for your support!
>
>
> On Mon, 9 Jun at 9:52 AM , service@simsonn.com

there is for example for the simjack pedals an upgrade with 6mm plate
available on aliexpress, it would be better if u also send me a 6mm
version, since with the 3mm version it will for sure cause problems again.

Am Mi., 11. Juni 2025 um 04:40 Uhr schrieb service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com>:

> Hi Nils Dautzenberg,
>
> We’re awaiting your response. Thank you for your support!
>
>
> On Mon, 9 Jun at 9:52 AM , service@simsonn.com
Hi Nils Dautzenberg,    We may send you a brand-new brake pedal with a 6mm mounting base as a replacement!
Hi Nils Dautzenberg,    Could you please send us a clear photo of the broken cross-section of the mounting plate? We’d like to examine how the break occurred

I would really appreciate if i actually got a new pedal, that would be very
nice.

I did already send pictures of the broken part though, im not really sure
what else i should send you, in my opinion u can exactly see how it broke
on the first picture of my last mail. After the plate bend, already then a
little hairline crack accured, then apparently at somepoint when i kept
using it that part completely snapped. The picture in my last mail i think
is the Top of the plate, atleast i would think that if i look at the black
paint, however, i think i might have put it in the other way around when i
disassembled the pedal the first time, maybe bending it into one and then
the other direction also led to the crack but the pedal has not really been
usable with the bend plate anyway, so that might have made it worse but
already before i would have needed new parts.
I think there is not much more to examine about how it bend and then
finally broke, the plate just isnt strong enough and maybe also the plate
in my specific case had an issue.

Also i can understand that you want to examine how the crack happend, but
it would be nice if you could still send me the new pedal, ideally tomorrow
or atleast in the next days, and also without writing more emails, i mean i
already wrote like 10 mails and it would be nice if it wouldnt take too
long until i have  an intact brake pedal again. If the new Pedal is on its
way and you for some reason still have questions about the broken part, i
am happy to help you with that further but i just dont wanna sit here for
so long without a brake pedal,

And if you have any idea around how long shipping will take it would be
nice if you wrote that in the answer on this mail.



Am So., 15. Juni 2025 um 07:51 Uhr schrieb service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com>:

> Hi Nils Dautzenberg,
>
> Could you please send us a clear photo of the broken cross-section of the
> mounting plate? We’d like to examine how the break occurred
>
>
> On Sun, 15 Jun at 1:46 AM , service@simsonn.com

Just wanted to remind you that im still waiting for a response.

I am waiting now since a whole week just to get a response, if there is a
good reason for this i am sorry but i already wrote 9 mails and now again i
have to wait a whole week so it is getting a bit annoying.
I sent you many photos, described the problem, gave you my adress, my oder
number and so on.
Apart from that one problem with the brake i was always happy with the
quality of your products and  i was definetly planning on buying more of
them like the clutch, the haptic upgrade etc. but if this doesnt get sorted
out soon i will definetly not rely on your products anymore.

Hi Nils Dautzenberg,      Hello, I previously submitted a request to our official store to send you a replacement brake unit. However, I later realized that your order was placed via AliExpress, so they missed the information.  Your shipping address is: Nils Dautzenberg Selstener Str. 54 52525 Waldfeucht Germany AliExpress Order Number: 3041186931613563  Please confirm if this information is correct. Once confirmed, I’ll ask our team to ship it out today and provide you with the tracking number as soon as possible.
Hi Nils Dautzenberg,  Please provide your shipping address, phone number, and contact person’s name so we can arrange the shipment accordingly.

Nils Dautzenberg

52525 Waldfeucht
Germany

2452 988610

Hi Nils Dautzenberg,  I’ve already shipped the 6mm thick brake pedal to you, and it should be available for pickup tomorrow. Tracking number: JSEXY2419339884YQ.  I sincerely apologize for the delay. We recently implemented a new after-sales management system, and in some cases, pending requests were not visible in time, which unfortunately caused this oversight. Thank you for your understanding.
